body:
Comment 3: 
I cannot reproduce this problem, neither with 32bit nor 64bit build for a fresh install
with:

export GOROOT=$HOME/go3
export GOARCH=386
hg clone -r release https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ $GOROOT
cd $GOROOT/src
sh all.bash
$GOROOT/src/cmd/godoc/godoc net

All tests that are supposed to pass pass, and godoc seems to work fine both in
command-line and server 
mode.

Please verify that your tree is indeed matching the release, for instance by doing a
fresh install into a new 
directory; please also verify that you have set GOROOT correctly when running godoc, and
that you are 
picking up the right version of godoc (which godoc).
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
